original_text: If that is how God clothes the grass of the field, which is here today, and tomorrow is thrown into the fire, how much more will he clothe you—you of little faith!
korean_text: 오늘 있다가 내일 아궁이에 던져지는 들풀도 하나님이 이렇게 입히시거든 하물며 너희일까보냐 믿음이 작은 자들아

sentences.original_text: If that is how God clothes the grass of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 하나님이 들의 풀을 그렇게 입히신다면

sentences.original_text: and tomorrow is thrown into the fire
how much more will he clothe you
